title: Espana Viva. Eps. 9-15
brief_description: The instructional Spanish course for beginners continues in this double video pack containing 7 episodes each running for 25 minutes consisting of simple conversations followed by a short film depicting local life in Spain. Ep.9: “Shopping”, ep.10: “Discussing recreational activities”, ep.11: “Making travel plans”, ep.12: “Booking a hotel”, ep.13: “Weather topics”, ep.14 “Talking about holidays”, ep.15 revises the language covered in the course and recommends “Essentials for the visitor to Spain”
